name: Peppermint Hot Chocolate Kiss
description: Bound to put a holiday flush in your cheeks. Make Hot Chocolate, and keep warm in Epicure Multipurpose Pot over low-heat.
preparation:
1. Pour a 1 oz shot of schnapps and 1 tsp coffee or chocolate liqueur into 2 mugs or tempered glass mugs.
  2. Fill with Hot Chocolate and stir well.
  3. Top with whipped cream and garnish with candy canes.
tips: DIY Bar Tip: Make hot chocolate in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Keep warm on the stove over medium-low heat. Place liqueurs close alongside recipe and garnishes.
